name: dragonfi-Trijam-119 Physical Law Constructor
description:
A very basic subatomic physics sandbox.

Made for Trijam-119 theme: Law & Order in 4 hours.

This is more of a toy then a game. Initially I intended this to be a puzzle game, but at the halfway mark I realized that the most I can finish in a couple of hours is a pleasing-looking sandbox. I hope you still find it somewhat interesting.

I used Godot as an engine, everything went pretty smooth with it. Exporting the game to multiple platforms was just a few clicks.

All assets were created by me during development time. It doesn't look like it, but it did take 45 minutes until I found something that is both pleasing and colorblind-friendly.
